member.name: T:My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:Contensive.Addons.aoDonations.donationHandlerControllerAndView.verifyUserAndAccount(Contensive.BaseClasses.CPBaseClass,Contensive.Addons.aoDonations.donationDetailsViewModel,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.String@)
